name: Nether Longship
desc: When enemy target receives "Blazar" DMG, "Murmur" stacks in possession obtains Charge equal to 10% of this instance of DMG. This cannot exceed 5% of the clearance threshold. For every 20% of the clearance threshold "Murmur" Charges, the enemy target immediately takes 1 instance of Lightning DoT DMG equal to 400% of the "Murmur" clearance threshold. This DMG is "Murmur" DMG and cannot defeat the enemy target.
